alert.note: Alert for Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 2:52PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Uplands of the Bootheel. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest winds will be along east slopes of area mountains. Blowing dust will be likely each afternoon.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
